titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation for the better making of saltpeter within this kingdome.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at Our Court at Whitehall the second day of Ianuarie, in the second yeere of Our Reigne of Great Britain, France, and Ireland.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
